title: 1.142 STATE FLOWER.
text:
The pink and white lady slipper, Cypripedium reginae, is the official flower of the state of Minnesota.
A photograph of the pink and white lady slipper, obtained and approved by the commissioner of natural resources, shall be preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.

variables.name: flower_name
variables.description: The name of the flower being considered.

variables.name: state
variables.description: The state for which the flower is being considered as the official flower.

variables.name: approved_by
variables.description: The authority who approved the photograph of the flower.

consequences: A photograph of the pink and white lady slipper is preserved in the Office of the Secretary of State.
